title: Courts of Appeal
context: CHAPTER 602 COURTS OF APPEAL Part I. Intermediate Appellate Court 602-51 How constituted 602-52 Salary 602-53 Terms 602-54 Session, where 602-55 Panels; substitute judge 602-56 Absence, disability, of the chief judge 602-57 Jurisdiction 602-58 Application for transfer to the supreme court 602-59 Review of decision of the intermediate appellate court, certiorari 602-60 Subpoenas; oaths Note As to procedural statutes superseded by the rules of court, see note preceding Title 32.
